title: A Dark & Dirty Sinners' MC Boxset
description:
The only place you’ll ever learn Nyx’s real name within an exclusive never-before-published novella.
They're dark. They're dirty. They're Sinners.They'll kneel for no man, but for their Queens? Just try and stop them. These brothers will ride into hell itself to keep their women safe, so stick around for the ride and devour NYX, LINK, SIN, STEEL, and CRUZ, and meet a brotherhood like no other. This is a FIVE book collection with over thirteen-hundred droolworthy pages of bikers you'll wish were yours.
author: Serena Akeroyd
